quoteText: Feel free to submit feedback at quora.com/contact. By submitting feedback, you agree to grant us the right, at our discretion, to use, disclose and otherwise exploit the feedback, in whole or part, freely and without compensation to you.
title: If you offer suggestions to the service, they become the owner of the ideas that you give them

tosdr.case: If you offer suggestions to the service, they become the owner of the ideas that you give them
